justification: "The value of physical effort was measured with the VoPE scale. The VoPE scale consists of 4 items … answered from 1 = Strongly disagree to 7 = Strongly agree."
"The value of cognitive effort was measured with the NfC scale. The NfC scale consists of 18 items … which were answered on the same scale as the VoPE."

"To assess preferred effort allocations, we used a validated computational approach … known as the ‘Ring Task’. In the adapted Ring Task, participants make binary choices about their preferred allocation of physical and cognitive effort."
construct: Preference for physical and cognitive effort allocation
